channel.title: Dark bow

item.title: Dark bow
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

i need to make the dark bow train range because atm it trains strength.

ive put this in my client.java

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 5;
UseBow = true;
}

now i need to edit the special for it to actually train range but i dont know which bit to edit. does anyone know?

Read full topic
